name: The Simpsons Tapped Out: Winter
description: Winter Theme for the 'The Simpsons Tapped Out' forums.
additional_info:
V1.0

Notes: I only have basic/intermediate HTML/CSS and UserStyles knowledge.

Disclaimer: Using this style will make forum posts hosted on the EA network to have this style. To only have this style displayed on the main forum pages of The Simpsons Tapped Out and not the individual posts. If you frequent other EA forums besides The Simpsons Tapped out, use this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/79854/the-simpsons-tapped-out-winter-main-pages-only
